error.title: An error occurred
error.development: The system encountered an unexpected error. Please try again later.
error.support: If the problem persists, please contact support and provide the Error ID

globalError.title: System Error
globalError.description: The application encountered a critical error
globalError.support: If the problem persists, please contact support

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist
notFound.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
notFound.support: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page
unauthorized.message: This page is restricted to administrators. If you believe this is an error, please contact the system administrator.
unauthorized.adminContact: To request admin access, please contact the system administrator

hero.badge: Cognitive Enhancement Partner for the AI Era
hero.description:
In the AI era, we face a paradox of extreme information abundance yet extreme scarcity of effective information.
AI Insight Engine is no longer a content provider, but your cognitive unloader and value refiner.

valueLevels.title: Four Levels of Value Enhancement
valueLevels.subtitle: We use AI to elevate you from raw information to wise action

information.title: Information
information.question: "What happened?"
information.description: Raw news content, lowest value, ubiquitous

insight.title: Insight
insight.question: "Why does this matter?"
insight.description: Connecting data points to reveal underlying patterns and meanings

foresight.title: Foresight
foresight.question: "What will happen next?"
foresight.description: Predicting future scenarios based on insights, providing a 'future map' for decisions

action.title: Action
action.question: "What should I do?"
action.description: Personalized, actionable advice, the rarest and most valuable

engines.title: The Three AI Engines
engines.subtitle: No longer 'modules', we call them 'engines' to power your cognition

insight.title: The Insight Engine
insight.description: Every piece of news comes with an AI-generated "Core Insight" tag, telling you "why this matters" in one sentence.

core.title: Core Insight
core.description: Extracts the key value in a single sentence

impact.title: Impact Analysis
impact.description: Analyzes the specific impact on different roles

foresight.title: The Foresight Engine
foresight.description: Click on any trend, and the AI will dynamically generate multiple "future scripts" to provide you with foresight.

optimistic.title: Optimistic Scenario
optimistic.description: The best possible outcome of technology adoption

action.title: The Action Engine
action.description: Generates personalized action plans for each insight based on your role.

roadmap.title: Time Planning
roadmap.description: Can be started within this week

finalCta.title: Start Your Cognitive Enhancement Journey
finalCta.subtitle: Let AI be your 'external brain', working tirelessly for you 24/7

insights.title: AI Insight Engine
insights.subtitle: From Information to Wisdom: Let AI extract value, foresee the future, and guide action for you
insights.noArticlesForTrend: No articles available for this trend yet.

errors.articles: Could not load articles at the moment. Please try again later.
errors.trends: Could not load trend data at the moment.

insights.title: Experience the AI Insight Engine
insights.description: This is a demo version with no live data. In a real environment, AI-analyzed latest tech news would be displayed here.

foresight.title: The Foresight Engine
foresight.description: When enough data is available, the AI will analyze technology trends and generate future scenario predictions for you here.

action.title: The Action Engine
action.descriptionWithRole: As a {role}, personalized action suggestions will be generated for you for each article.
action.descriptionWithoutRole: Select a role, and the AI will generate a personalized action plan for you.
